- Hi, I'm Sounil Yu, creator
of the Cyber Defense Matrix.
Good security is about layering defenses

and the next-generation firewall
is one way to easily add

several layers of network
centric capabilities
to further secure your AWS environment.

AWS Marketplace has a breadth
of third party solutions

that offer cloud native
next-generation firewall platforms.

These platforms combine
multiple integrated

security functions to manage
your network security posture

and defend against
constantly evolving threats.

To guard against
unauthorized inbound traffic,

next-generation firewalls
typically include features

such as intrusion prevention,
VPN gateways, antivirus,
and anti-bot capabilities.

To watch for and stop
unauthorized outbound traffic,

they include features such
as intrusion detection,

application control,
SSL or TLS inspection,
and web filtering capabilities.

Now you don't necessarily
need to use all these features
but you do want to enable features

that counter specific
elements of your threat model.

We recommend utilizing a
single integrated solution
that's easy to deploy and manage
and that offers simplicity,

visibility, and operational
efficiency in AWS.
We also recommend looking for vendors
that can offer deployment flexibility

that allows you to manage
security features from one place

and that provides visibility
across your entire footprint.
